author: Special Correspondent
text:
Chief Minister Jayalalithaa announced that 157 assistant professors in government medical colleges will be promoted as professors. Around 15,000 nurses appointed on consolidated pay would be brought under time scale on the basis of seniority. Similarly, 605 village health nurses will be elevated as health department nurses.

Ms. Jayalalithaa said the monthly honorarium of guest lecturers of government arts and science colleges would be increased from Rs. 10,000 to Rs. 15,000. The pension contribution from employees who joined service in April 2003 and the government’s contribution with interest would be disbursed immediately for retired employees and their legal heirs. She also announced constitution of a tribunal to deal with cases of government employees.

Honorarium for guest lecturers to be hiked from Rs. 10,000 to Rs. 15,000
title: Promotions for professors, nurses
